message.content: This question requires some knowledge about the natural habitat and needs of polar bears. A polar bear exhibit in a zoo will typically contain strong fans to simulate the cold temperatures of the polar regions where polar bears naturally reside. Option (A) is incorrect because salt is not necessary for a polar bear exhibit. Option (B) is incorrect because cacti are not found in the polar regions and are not suitable for a polar bear's habitat. Option (D) is incorrect because sand is not a natural component of a polar bear's habitat.

Option (D) is incorrect because sand is not typically included in a polar bear exhibit.
